name: Mozart Alarm Clock
description: Does listening to Mozart make you smarter? Find out for yourself!   Treat yourself to over three hours of Mozarts finest works! Whether you are a classical music affectionado, or just familiarizing yourself with the classical scene, Mozarts work will surely start your day off on an energetic and creative note!  Choose from over 30 full-length compositions!  This app features gradual light and sound, and will wake you gently, pleasantly, and reliably. The music starts softly, with a dark background, and the music loudens as the background brightens, illuminating beautiful scenery containing nature and flowers.
